attributes.action: SNAP GENERAL ELECTION FOR A NEW BRITISH PRIME MINISTER.
attributes.additional_details: I WANT ACTION AS I'M A PURITAN-PROTESTANT-JEW & I BELIEVE IN A MERITOCRACY & I BELIEVE IN BRITISH PEOPLE RULING BRITAIN FOR BRITONS;
attributes.background: I WANT BRITONS TO RESTORE FAITH IN OUR POLITICIANS BY NOT HAVING A BOUGHT&PAID ELITIST PUPPET THAT HAS ITS STRINGS PULLED, BY THOSE UPPER ECHELONS THAT CARE FOR NOBODY OR ANYTHING EXCEPT FOR KEEPING PEOPLE LIVING IN ABSOLUTE PENURY. WHILE THEY TAKE ALL THE PROFITS OF FIAT CURRENCY CORRUPTION;
